page.title: 14CLUBS - HEDINGHAM
page.content: There are several sports clubs in the area with their own premises and grounds. These include a cricket club, tennis club and a bowls club all in Castle Hedingham. There is a snooker and billiard club in Sible Hedingham. Other clubs include netball, rounders and football. The largest and most popular social club is the 'Memorial Hall' club held in an extension of the old Parish school house which is now the Village Hall. This hall is used extensively by other groups (W.I., Cubs, Brownies, Guides, the badminton and table tennis clubs, old time dancing, the youth group, disabled adults club and the pensioner's club). There is something for all interests and ages. The Hedingham Youth & Adult Centre held in the Comprehensive school runs a youth club and many courses.
